fields.name: cottage1
fields.description: A serene retreat for two, this minimalist cottage offers a peaceful stay with stunning river views. Featuring two comfortable single beds, itâ€™s the perfect spot for those looking to reconnect with nature and unwind in simplicity.

fields.name: cottage2
fields.description: A tranquil escape overlooking picturesque meadows, this cozy cottage sleeps three with a comfortable double bed and a single bed. Ideal for nature lovers and minimalists alike, it's the perfect place to relax, recharge, and immerse in the beauty of the outdoors.

fields.name: cottage3
fields.description: Nestled with breathtaking mountain views, this cozy retreat sleeps four comfortably in two double beds. Perfect for those seeking a minimalist escape, it offers a peaceful ambiance to relax and reconnect with nature amidst stunning landscapes.

fields.name: manor1
fields.description: This spacious, air-conditioned bedroom offers a luxurious stay for up to five guests, featuring breathtaking river views from a private balcony. Thoughtfully designed with comfort in mind, the room includes a mix of plush bedding arrangements and modern amenities, including a flat-screen TV for added relaxation. Perfect for families or groups, this retreat combines elegance and scenic beauty for an unforgettable stay.

fields.name: manor2
fields.description: This expansive, air-conditioned bedroom accommodates up to five guests and boasts stunning river views from a private balcony. Elegantly appointed, it offers a mix of comfortable beds and modern amenities, including a flat-screen TV for unwinding in style. Ideal for families or groups, this serene retreat pairs refined comfort with the tranquil beauty of riverfront scenery.
